title: Boten Anna
lyric:
Hon röjer upp I våran kanal.
Jag vill berätta för dig att jag känner en bot.

title: Wake Me Up
lyric: Life's a game made for everyone. And love is a prize.

title: Dancing Queen
lyric: You're a teaser, you turn 'em on. Leave them burning and then you're gone. Looking out for another, anyone will do. You're in the mood for a dance.

title: All That She Wants
lyric: It's not a day for work. It's a day for catching tan. Just laying on the beach and having fun.

title: The Look
lyric: Walking like a man. Hitting like a hammer. She's a juvenile scam. Never was a quitter.

title: I Love It
lyric: I threw you shit into a bag and pushed it down the stairs. I crashed my car into the bridge. I don't care!

title: Never Forget You
lyric: But sometimes you just gotta know that these things fall through. I can't hide my connection with you.

title: The Final Countdown
lyric: I guess there is no one to blame. We're leaving ground (leaving ground). Will things ever be the same again?
